item.title: Making an animated ggplot

Itâ€™s a french word game with my family name Sauder => Saut dâ€™R (R jump in english). Thatâ€™s why I decided to make a banner with the R-logo jumping on some (so cool) stickers. I choose stickers of packages that I use to do this animated ggplot. Which packages ?

item.title: About
item.description: About this blog At the general request of 3 people on Twitter… Here is my blog! Why this blog ? For reproducibility ! To share with R community but also for me, to organise what I do and to have a chance to recover what I had already coded but don’t remember how… What’s in it ? Some data science stuff with R. I like testing some packages, trying that I discover in conferences and workshops.
